bug.author: mwydmuch
bug.summary: respawnPlayer may couse incorrect end of the multiplayer game when called in few last tics
bug.description: ...which causes map change and leads to further errors. Reported by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pengsun>@pengsun</denchmark-link> - thank you.

comments.comment: This should prevent it from occurring.
Wow, amazing! You are so efficient, thank YOU!
I've run few thousand episodes with random agent (30 seconds each) without a problem so I assume that the fix works and I'm closing it.
